collection:
For additional information see: <https://aws.amazon.com/security>

## Privacy

Heroku has a published privacy policy that clearly defines what data is
collected and how it is used.
sharing:
Amazon only provides data center access and information to employees who have
a legitimate business need for such privileges.

There may be cases where Heroku is requested to
interact with customer data or applications at the request of the customer for
support purposes or where required by law.

Be mindful of the data shared with
these providers and their security practices just as you would be with Heroku.
